value: Client-specific packaging requirements, auto-boxing for standard items
Manifesting system integrated with carriers, some manual documentation
Kitting, labeling, gift wrapping, custom packaging, promotional inserts
Automated carton sealers, label printers, dimensioning systems at 60% of pack stations
UPS, FedEx, USPS, regional LTL carriers, client-arranged freight
Multi-carrier shipping software with rate shopping
Staging by carrier, scheduled pickup times, some live loading
Automated manifest generation, EDI 856 ASNs for 70% of shipments
Carrier tracking integration, client portals for visibility
Separate returns area with inspection stations, disposition workflow (restock/repair/scrap)
Manual inspection and disposition, some client-specific rules in WMS
Average 5 days from receipt to disposition
Client-specific policies - some immediate credit, others after inspection
